fpond.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 ! ==================================================================
00003 !
00004 !                        PONDEROMOTIVE FORCE
00005 !
00006 !  Compute relativistic fpond for standing wave field
00007 !
00008 ! ==================================================================
00009 
00010 subroutine fpond(t,tpulse,sigma_in,vosc,omega,rho_upper,x,y,z,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipon)
00011 
00012   implicit none
00013   real, intent(in) :: t ! time
00014   real, intent(in) :: tpulse ! pulse duration/rise time
00015   real, intent(in) :: vosc ! quiver strength
00016   real, intent(in) :: sigma_in ! pulse width (1/e)
00017   real, intent(in) :: omega ! laser frequency
00018   real, intent(in) :: x,y,z ! position to evaluate force; x is distance into target from surface (x_c)
00019   real, intent(in) :: rho_upper
00020   real, intent(out) :: phipon, epon_x, epon_y, epon_z ! pond. potential and fields
00021 
00022   real :: xf, yf, zf, Tpon, Rpon, Xpon, Ypon, Zpon, intensity, gamma, sigma, atten, theta
00023   real :: r, pi=3.141592654, phi, chi, a02, sigma0
00024   real :: rho0_up, wp_r, ls_r, gamma_s, f2d
00025   real :: Z_R  ! Rayleigh length
00026 
00027   ! fast oscillations 
00028  Tpon = (sin(omega*t))**2
00029 
00030   ! intensity envelope
00031   a02 = vosc**2
00032   if (t <= 2*tpulse) then 
00033    intensity = a02*max(0.,sin(pi*t/2./tpulse)**2) 
00034   else 
00035     intensity = 0.
00036   endif
00037 
00038   rho0_up = rho_upper*omega**2   ! Effective density of shelf above xc normalised to rho0
00039 
00040   if (sigma_in <0) then
00041      sigma0=-sigma_in
00042      f2d = 0.  ! switch off 2d field components
00043   else
00044      sigma0=sigma_in
00045      f2d=1.
00046   endif
00047 
00048 !  Standing wave in vacuum; evanescent in overdense plasma
00049 !  Use standard solution of Helmholtz equation for step profile
00050 
00051  ! Normalised Rayleigh length k_p Z_R = omega_0/omega_p * (k_p sigma0)^2
00052   Z_R = omega*sigma0**2
00053 
00054   gamma_s = sqrt(1.+4*intensity/rho_upper)  ! gamma factor for EM solution at x=xc
00055   wp_r = sqrt(rho0_up/gamma_s)  ! effective plasma frequency of upper shelf
00056   ls_r = 1./wp_r   ! rel. skin depth
00057 
00058   phi = atan(-omega/wp_r) ! Interface phase factor given by tan(phi) = -k * l_s
00059   chi = omega*x + phi  ! Vacuum phase 
00060 
00061   if (x.le.0) then
00062      xf = omega*sin(2*chi)
00063      Xpon = sin(chi)    ! laser 'Ez'
00064      sigma = sigma0*sqrt(1.+abs(x)**2/Z_R**2)  ! Vacuum spot size for Gaussian beam
00065 
00066   else
00067      xf = -2/ls_r*sin(phi)**2*exp(-2*x/ls_r)
00068      Xpon = sin(phi)*exp(-x/ls_r)    ! laser Ez inside
00069      sigma = sigma0  ! Don't expand spot inside target
00070   endif
00071 
00072   r = sqrt(y**2+z**2)
00073 
00074   theta = pi*r/4./sigma  ! sigma is HWHM of sin^2 laser spot 
00075 !  Rpon = exp((-yd**2-zd**2)/sigma**2)  ! Gaussian
00076 
00077   if (r < 2*sigma .and. r/= 0.) then
00078      yf = -pi/4./sigma*y/r*sin(2*theta)
00079      zf = -pi/4./sigma*z/r*sin(2*theta)
00080      Rpon = cos(theta)**2
00081   else if (r >= 2*sigma) then
00082      yf = 0.
00083      zf = 0.
00084      Rpon = 0.
00085   else
00086      Rpon = cos(theta)**2
00087      yf = 0.
00088      zf = 0.
00089   endif
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093   atten = sigma0**2/sigma**2
00094   phipon = 4*Xpon**2*Rpon*atten*intensity  ! intensity, including attenuation factor
00095 
00096   gamma = sqrt(1.+abs(phipon*Tpon))  ! relativistic phi_pond
00097 
00098   Epon_x = 2*intensity*Tpon*Rpon/gamma*xf*atten
00099   Epon_y = f2d*2*intensity*Tpon*Xpon**2/gamma*yf*atten
00100   Epon_z = f2d*2*intensity*Tpon*Xpon**2/gamma*zf*atten
00101 !  Epon_z = 0.   
00102 
00103 end subroutine fpond
